TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: This is a reusable expression which gets all the input values for the target table:ITEM. It defaults to ' ' or 0 when the inputs are null or contain spaces.The output fields passes the variables used.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_ITEM

MAPPLET.DESCRIPTION: Mapplet to get the ITEM_ID for different Manufacturing Items
MAPPLET.NAME: ML_ITEMID_MFG

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Output field ITEM_ID for manufacturing items from the Mapplet
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: OUT_ITEM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Expression to set default values for fields that are not applicable for a DIVISION_GROUP
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_ITEM

TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: IIF(ISNULL($$DIVISION_GROUP) OR LENGTH(LTRIM(RTRIM($$DIVISION_GROUP))) = 0, ABORT('Parameter file for division_group not setup'), $$DIVISION_GROUP)
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: V_DIVISION_GRP_PARAM

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Lookup to get the ITEM_ID for different manufacturing items.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_ITEM

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup Sql Override
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT I.ITEM_ID as ITEM_ID, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'tts',NVL(I.ATTRIBUTION_CODE,' '),'slsp',NVL(I.ATTRIBUTION_CODE,' '),' ') as ATTRIBUTION_CODE, TRIM(I.DIVISION_GROUP) as DIVISION_GROUP, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'sls',NVL(I.SKU,' '),' ') AS SKU, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.STYLE_NUM,' '),'slsp',NVL(I.STYLE_NUM,' '),'tts',NVL(I.STYLE_NUM,' '),' ') as STYLE_NUM, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slsp',NVL(I.COLOR_CODE,' '),'slu',NVL(I.COLOR_CODE,' '),'tts',NVL(I.COLOR_CODE,' '),' ') as COLOR_CODE, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.SIZE_CODE,' '),'slsp',NVL(I.SIZE_CODE,' '),'tts',NVL(I.SIZE_CODE,' '),' ') as SIZE_CODE, ' ' AS CUP_SIZE, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.X_SIZE,' '),' ') as X_SIZE, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.SIZE_POS,' '),' ') as SIZE_POS, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.SIZE_LINE,' '),' ') as SIZE_LINE, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.PACK_CODE,' '),' ') as PACK_CODE, 'MFG' AS ITEM_TYPE_CODE, ' ' AS UPC_CODE, ' ' AS SAP_GRID_VALUE, ' ' AS SAP_MATERIAL_NUM, DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'tts',NVL(I.CUT_WIDTH,0),'slsp',NVL(I.CUT_WIDTH,0),0) as CUT_WIDTH FROM ITEM I WHERE LOWER(TRIM(I.DIVISION_GROUP)) = LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')) AND I.ITEM_TYPE_CODE = 'MFG' AND I.ITEM_ID IN (SELECT MIN(I.ITEM_ID) FROM ITEM I WHERE LOWER(TRIM(I.DIVISION_GROUP)) = LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')) AND I.ITEM_TYPE_CODE = 'MFG' GROUP BY DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'tts',NVL(I.ATTRIBUTION_CODE,' '),'slsp',NVL(I.ATTRIBUTION_CODE,' '),' ') , TRIM(I.DIVISION_GROUP) , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'sls',NVL(I.SKU,' '),' ') , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.STYLE_NUM,' '),'slsp',NVL(I.STYLE_NUM,' '),'tts',NVL(I.STYLE_NUM,' '),' ') , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slsp',NVL(I.COLOR_CODE,' '),'slu',NVL(I.COLOR_CODE,' '),'tts',NVL(I.COLOR_CODE,' '),' ') , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.SIZE_CODE,' '),'slsp',NVL(I.SIZE_CODE,' '),'tts',NVL(I.SIZE_CODE,' '),' ') , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.X_SIZE,' '),' ') , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.SIZE_POS,' '),' ') , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.SIZE_LINE,' '),' ') , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'slu',NVL(I.PACK_CODE,' '),' ') , DECODE(LOWER(TRIM('$$DIVISION_GROUP')),'tts',NVL(I.CUT_WIDTH,0),'slsp',NVL(I.CUT_WIDTH,0),0))

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: ATTRIBUTION_CODE = I_ATTRIBUTION_CODE AND DIVISION_GROUP = I_DIVISION_GROUP AND SKU = I_SKU AND STYLE_NUM = I_STYLE_NUM AND COLOR_CODE = I_COLOR_CODE AND SIZE_CODE = I_SIZE_CODE AND CUP_SIZE = I_CUP_SIZE AND X_SIZE = I_X_SIZE AND SIZE_POS = I_SIZE_POS AND SIZE_LINE = I_SIZE_LINE AND PACK_CODE = I_PACK_CODE AND ITEM_TYPE_CODE = I_ITEM_TYPE_CODE AND UPC_CODE = I_UPC_CODE AND SAP_GRID_VALUE = I_SAP_GRID_VALUE AND SAP_MATERIAL_NUM = I_SAP_MATERIAL_NUM AND CUT_WIDTH = I_CUT_WIDTH

Additional Concurrent Pipelines for Lookup Cache Creation

SESSION.DESCRIPTION: The seesion loads the ITEM table from STG_OW_WIP_INV_BALANCE.
SESSION.NAME: s_m_ITEM_OW_WIP

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE: SELECT DISTINCT a.STYLE, a.COLOR, a.SIZE_CD, a.ATTRIBUTE_CD, MAX( CASE WHEN (a.lw_account = 132300 and a.lw_sub_account = 0002 and a.operation_no = '30049' and a.in_transit_ind = 'N' and a.mtrl_type_cd = 'CT') THEN 223 WHEN ( a.lw_account = 132300 and a.lw_sub_account = 0002 and a.operation_no = '30070' and a.in_transit_ind = 'N' and a.mtrl_type_cd = 'CT') THEN 224 WHEN (a.lw_account = 132300 and a.lw_sub_account = 0003 and a.operation_no = '80620' and a.in_transit_ind = 'N' and a.plant = b.plant_cd and b.business_type_desc = 'ATTRIBUTION') THEN 232 WHEN (a.lw_account = 132300 and a.lw_sub_account = 0003 and a.in_transit_ind = 'N' and a.plant = b.plant_cd and b.business_type_desc = 'ATTRIBUTION') THEN 233 WHEN (a.lw_account = 133305 and a.lw_sub_account in(0004,0005) and a.in_transit_ind = 'Y' and a.receive_plant = b.plant_cd and b.business_type_desc = 'ATTRIBUTION') THEN 235 WHEN (a.lw_account = 132305 and a.lw_sub_account = 0001 and a.in_transit_ind = 'Y' and a.receive_plant = b.plant_cd and b.sewing_ind = 'Y') THEN 241 WHEN (a.lw_account = 132300 and a.lw_sub_account = 0002 and a.in_transit_ind = 'N' and a.plant = b.plant_cd and b.sewing_ind = 'Y') THEN 242 WHEN (a.lw_account = 132300 and a.lw_sub_account = 0003 and a.operation_no = '60500' and a.in_transit_ind = 'N' and a.plant = b.plant_cd and b.sewing_ind = 'Y') THEN 243 WHEN ( a.lw_account = 132300 and a.lw_sub_account = 0003 and a.operation_no = '-----' and a.in_transit_ind = 'N' and a.plant = b.plant_cd and b.sewing_ind = 'Y') THEN 244 WHEN (a.lw_account = 132300 and a.lw_sub_account = 0003 and a.operation_no in( '31100','82200','82300') and a.in_transit_ind = 'N' and a.plant = b.plant_cd and b.sewing_ind = 'Y') THEN 246 WHEN (a.lw_account = 133305 and a.lw_sub_account = 0004 and a.in_transit_ind = 'Y' and a.plant = b.plant_cd and b.business_type_desc = 'TURNKEY') THEN 248 WHEN (a.lw_account = 132305 and a.lw_sub_account = 0000 and a.in_transit_ind = 'Y' and a.receive_plant = b.plant_cd and b.cutting_ind = 'Y') THEN 221 WHEN (a.LW_ACCOUNT = 132300 AND a.LW_SUB_ACCOUNT = 0003 AND a.OPERATION_NO = '-----' AND a.IN_TRANSIT_IND = 'N' AND a.PLANT = b.PLANT_CD AND b.SEWING_IND = 'N' AND b.ATTRIBUTION_IND = 'Y') THEN 249 WHEN (a.LW_ACCOUNT = 132300 AND a.LW_SUB_ACCOUNT = 0003 AND a.OPERATION_NO IN ('31100','82200','82300') AND a.IN_TRANSIT_IND = 'N' AND a.PLANT = b.PLANT_CD AND b.SEWING_IND = 'N' AND b.ATTRIBUTION_IND = 'Y') THEN 250 END) AS INVENTORY_GRP_CD FROM STG_OW_WIP_INV_BALANCE a, STG_OW_WIP_PLANT b WHERE ((a.lw_account = 132300 and a.lw_sub_account = 0002 and a.operation_no = '30049' and a.in_transit_ind = 'N' and a.mtrl_type_cd = 'CT') OR ( a.lw_account = 132300 and a.lw_sub_account = 0002 and a.operation_no = '30070' and a.in_transit_ind = 'N' and a.mtrl_type_cd = 'CT') OR (a.lw_account = 132300 and a.lw_sub_account = 0003 and a.operation_no = '80620' and a.in_transit_ind = 'N' and a.plant = b.plant_cd and b.business_type_desc = 'ATTRIBUTION') OR (a.lw_account = 132300 and a.lw_sub_account = 0003 and a.in_transit_ind = 'N' and a.plant = b.plant_cd and b.business_type_desc = 'ATTRIBUTION') OR (a.lw_account = 133305 and a.lw_sub_account in(0004,0005) and a.in_transit_ind = 'Y' and a.receive_plant = b.plant_cd and b.business_type_desc = 'ATTRIBUTION') OR (a.lw_account = 132305 and a.lw_sub_account = 0001 and a.in_transit_ind = 'Y' and a.receive_plant = b.plant_cd and b.sewing_ind = 'Y') OR (a.lw_account = 132300 and a.lw_sub_account = 0002 and a.in_transit_ind = 'N' and a.plant = b.plant_cd and b.sewing_ind = 'Y') OR (a.lw_account = 132300 and a.lw_sub_account = 0003 and a.operation_no = '60500' and a.in_transit_ind = 'N' and a.plant = b.plant_cd and b.sewing_ind = 'Y') OR ( a.lw_account = 132300 and a.lw_sub_account = 0003 and a.operation_no = '-----' and a.in_transit_ind = 'N' and a.plant = b.plant_cd and b.sewing_ind = 'Y') OR (a.lw_account = 132300 and a.lw_sub_account = 0003 and a.operation_no in( '31100','82200','82300') and a.in_transit_ind = 'N' and a.plant = b.plant_cd and b.sewing_ind = 'Y') OR (a.lw_account = 133305 and a.lw_sub_account = 0004 and a.in_transit_ind = 'Y' and a.plant = b.plant_cd and b.business_type_desc = 'TURNKEY') OR ( a.lw_account = 132305 and a.lw_sub_account = 0000 and a.in_transit_ind = 'Y' and a.receive_plant = b.plant_cd and b.cutting_ind = 'Y') OR (a.LW_ACCOUNT = 132300 AND a.LW_SUB_ACCOUNT = 0003 AND a.OPERATION_NO = '-----' AND a.IN_TRANSIT_IND = 'N' AND a.PLANT = b.PLANT_CD AND b.SEWING_IND = 'N' AND b.ATTRIBUTION_IND = 'Y') OR (a.LW_ACCOUNT = 132300 AND a.LW_SUB_ACCOUNT = 0003 AND a.OPERATION_NO IN ('31100','82200','82300') AND a.IN_TRANSIT_IND = 'N' AND a.PLANT = b.PLANT_CD AND b.SEWING_IND = 'N' AND b.ATTRIBUTION_IND = 'Y')) GROUP BY STYLE, COLOR, SIZE_CD, ATTRIBUTE_CD
